text: Donja Vrbava (()) is a village in central Serbia. Its inhabitants are known as Vrbavci. Located at and 538 m above sea level, it lies southwest of the city of Gornji Milanovac and northeast of the city of Kragujevac. The village had an electrical transformer installed in 2002. Category:Populated places in Moravica District
title: Donja Vrbava
